item.description:
All Saints Day Seminar
Rev. Gabrielle Fisher

Saturday, November 1 â€¢ 7:30 p.m. to 9 p.m.
Cost: $20

Using multimedia we will discuss what makes these devotees stand out as some of the most important saints of all time. This seminar will include discussion on various saints: St John of the Cross, St Francis of Assissi, Hildegarde Von Bingen, and Padre Pio.
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the Orange line.
item.name: All Saints Day Seminar
